description:
The Battle Pod is the standard combat mecha of the Mardook`s Zentradi forces. It is a simple mecha, but is well armed with both beam cannons and missiles. A full-sized Zentradi pilots the Battle Pod while lying forward across almost the full length of the pod.
Source: http://www.macross2.net/m3/macross2/battlepod.htm
name: Zentradi-you One-man Sentou Pod
